title: AR-Based Science Inquiry Learning Design: Simulation-Integrated Education for Large-Scale Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid operation combining weekend-intensive workshops for working professionals with asynchronous learning via LMS.

learning_goals: Design virtual experiments and perform data analysis processes with at least 80% accuracy using AR simulation tools
Create presentations explaining scientific phenomena to peers by visualizing them in 3D augmented reality
Identify three or more technical/educational barriers occurring in the scientific problem-solving process and propose solutions through team-based AR project development
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
